level.heading: ENTITY TRANSACTIONS[COLON] GOOD STANDING FOR DOMESTICATING ENTITIES (ยง 17-732)

level.text: 732.1 In addition to the requirements of Chapter 2 (Entity Transactions) ofhe Act (D.C. Official Code ยง 29-201.01 et seq. (2011 Repl.)), a registeredoreign entity becoming a domestic entity shall be in good standing with theuperintendent before filing its statement of domestication.
